name: Air race
description:
This game simulates flying on a small plane. The simulator has a HUD and basic controls. The flight physics are simplified to ensure ease of piloting. But in general, the game is aimed at having some realism.

The physics of aircraft flight is similar to that created for the Air simulator. There is only one competitor in the race. The player's task is to be the first to get through the gate.

Controls

'Z'/'X' - throttle

'W'/'S' - pitch

'A'/'D' - roll

'Q'/'E' - yaw

'C' - camera
